name: Uniroyal Tiger Paw Touring NT Tire 215/60R16 95V

reviews.name: Uniroyal Tiger Paw Touring NT Tire 215/60R16 95V
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 4 tires to replace Michelin tires which had met their milage warranty. These tires were rated highly and have exceeded my expectations regarding comfort and traction in snow. We do a lot of interstate driving at high speed, with a lot of secondary road travel, the tires have felt firm and handled perfectly. I would recommend them for people, encountering snow and rain issues, looking for a great value.
reviews.title: Excellent buy for price charged.

reviews.name: Uniroyal Tiger Paw Touring NT Tire 215/60R16 95V
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these for my 2003 Infiniti Q45. I am looking for great value at a reasonable price. Uniroyal is part of the Michelin family. It comes with an 80K warranty. Great value! I paid $103 per tire which compares very favorably with other tires that I was considering (Goodyear, Yokohama, Continental, Michelin etc) which ranged from $150 to $250.
reviews.title: Incredible Value

reviews.name: Uniroyal Tiger Paw Touring NT Tire 215/60R16 95V
reviews.reviewText: Put a set of 225.55.16's on my Mercedes 500SL. What a day and night positive difference in the ride quality with no loss of handling from the Michelin Pilots they replaced. Great tire now made by Michelin at half the Michelin price. Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Excellent tire and value

reviews.name: Uniroyal Tiger Paw Touring NT Tire 215/60R16 95V
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my wife's car (2009 Acura TSX). They have awesome traction and handling with a quiet ride. They're a great value in my opinion.
reviews.title: Great Tires

reviews.name: Uniroyal Tiger Paw Touring NT Tire 215/60R16 95V
reviews.reviewText:
Got these for my 1986 Thunderbird Turbo Coupe....great tires, excellent value. Give a very nice ride, and when you want to corner, they stick to the road as well as anything else out there.

I spent 22 yrs. as a Performance Tech with Ford, did a lot of tire testing/evaluating, and have had other great experiences with Tiger Paw radials on the test track, as well as my own performance cars. Excellent, all-around tires, that will give you your money's worth.
reviews.title: Excellent tires for ride and handling.
